summary: Status: Campaign 1 milestones locked (M1=2025-11-28, M3=2025-12-05); owners needed per front
instructions: Reply with owner names for M1 and M3 for your front
If you object to dates, include owner + new targets
If no change, reply NO-CHANGE with owner names

details.request: Provide owner names for M1 and M3 per front or lodge objections
details.note: Silence implies acceptance of dates; still need named owners per front to track accountability.
